info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:06AM EST until February 13 at 8:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches on Sunday. * WHERE...Berrien County. The greatest additional snowfall amounts are expected today across northern Berrien County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills between zero and negative ten this morning will reach drop to around zero again tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Plan on extra travel time within snow. Be sure to bundle up in layers and cover outer extremities if outside.
